name: Mai Chau Cycling Tour
description: This trip offers a great opportunity to see the two area of outstanding nature beauty; the North West highlands of Mai Chau. Biking is a great way to see this fascinating and visually stunning part of Vietnam, offering both physical activity and the unique opportunity to observe a way of life that has changed little over the centuries. As we ride in Mai Chau we encounter Muong and White Thai minorities and are guests in their traditional stilt houses allowing us to see firsthand how these minority peoples live…
